comments:

doing at the time.

Steps with 3.0 RC1 on WinXP:
- new workspace, new java project, create new class with wizard: p.MyClass
- enable "Show Source of Selected Element Only" in toolbar
- click on 'MyClass' in Outline view
- Ctrl+W
